title: Poppy passive bug
body: If poppy has her passive and you try to E someone from max range, she will try to AA with her passive, which cancels the animation for her E and so end up doing neither ability and just spazzes out trying to do both abilities for a second.

replies.body:
Go to support and message Riot, they always get your message and respond - some times it just takes a while.

I had this bug 3 times in 10 games where I'm trying to E someone and she spins rapidly on the spot until you input a movement command which is pretty game breaking.
I found she does try to aa them with her passive when you e, but mine has her throwing the buckler mid dash instead of spazzing (which is a lot cooler than what you have)

Put this in Help & Support, you'll get responses from people who know what they're doing over there.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 
its Report a Bug (NA) section bugs go in, not Help & Support

unfortunately, Report a Bug (NA) is pointless, NA has so many people theres no way it'll get seen, hell riot don't even respond to most of the few posts on OCE and those are here for days, imagine having a hundred thousand crying americans to deal with. 

plus even if they didn't see it, I'm from New Zealand, a little tribal island off the coast of Australia whose main language is 'english' not 'american' so my opinion is instantly less valid. 

i wish it was not so :(
Help and Support is the closest thing to it on Oce, so you know.
